content: Wrist pain limiting function, evaluation for right total wrist arthroplasty
title: Chief Complaint

content: The patient reports significant wrist pain that limits her ability to perform daily activities. She has bilateral wrist arthritis and is interested in right total wrist arthroplasty. Her synovitis has improved following a rheumatologist-administered injection. She has also started an infusion for osteoporosis. Her knee replacement has healed sufficiently to allow consideration of a wrist rescue procedure. She is here for evaluation and treatment of her wrist condition.
title: HPI Spencer

content: Exam mostly unchanged, except you can delete the large, poorly defined nodule. Um... The imaging you can leave all the same.
title: Musculoskeletal

content: The imaging you can leave all the same.
title: Imaging Results

content: Plan to evaluate for right total wrist arthroplasty.
Continue current management for osteoporosis with infusion.
Follow-up to discuss surgical options for right wrist.
title: Plan
